subtitle: A very simple mid-week type of meal that is economical as well.

method.text: Cook the pasta according to pack instructions. Drain well.
While the pasta is cooking, heat the oil in a pan and gently fry courgettes and mushrooms for 2-3 min or until tender.
Add the pasta to the courgettes and mushrooms. Carefully stir in the tomatoes and egg.
Pile the pasta into warmed serving bowls. Sprinkle with cheese and chopped parsley.

title: Healthy egg and vegetable pasta
